description: Control virtual computers through a cloud-based desktop environment. Enable agents to perform mouse, keyboard, and terminal actions programmatically. Facilitate seamless interaction with virtual machines for automation and testing purposes.

capabilities.name: initialize_computer
capabilities.description: Initialize a virtual computer with the provided API key.

capabilities.name: get_screenshot
capabilities.description: Take a screenshot of the virtual computer's display.

capabilities.name: left_click
capabilities.description: Perform a left mouse click at the specified coordinates.

capabilities.name: right_click
capabilities.description: Perform a right mouse click at the specified coordinates.

capabilities.name: double_click
capabilities.description: Perform a double click at the specified coordinates.

capabilities.name: scroll
capabilities.description: Scroll in the specified direction and amount.

capabilities.name: type_text
capabilities.description: Type the specified text into the virtual computer.

capabilities.name: press_key
capabilities.description: Press a key or key combination (e.g., 'Enter', 'ctrl+c').

capabilities.name: wait
capabilities.description: Wait for the specified number of seconds.

capabilities.name: execute_bash
capabilities.description: Execute a bash command on the virtual computer.

capabilities.name: shutdown_computer
capabilities.description: Shutdown and terminate the virtual computer instance.

capabilities.name: get_status
capabilities.description: Get the current status of the virtual computer.

capabilities.name: prompt
capabilities.description: Control the computer with natural language using an AI agent.
